about.sys:
As there is increasing number of students, need of tuitions and tutors are also increasing. But this finding process of tuitions and tutors is difficult in Bangladesh as there is no particular trustable platform that connects these two things together. This system guarantees the students to find 100% trustable tutor, as well as the tutors to find tuitions with their desired facilities.
This system will be a platform for both the tutors and the students. Here, tutors will be able to give their preferences and students will be able to find tutors as per their needs.
